titleInfo.title: Captain Eddie Rickenbacker at Berry Field, Nashville, Tennessee, 1950 June

mods.identifier: RG 3 5200 Capt Eddie Rickenbacker at Berry Field June 1950 008

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Pictured left to right: Captain Eddie Rickenbacker shaking hands with an unidentified man at Berry Field. This photo relates to Rickenbacker’s visit to Nashville, Tennessee, circa June 1950. The famous aviator was met by city officials, the media, and admiring fans upon his arrival to Berry Field via Eastern Airlines. Edward “Eddie” Vernon Rickenbacker was an American fighter ace in World War I and Medal of Honor recipient. Rickenbacker became General Manager of Eastern Airlines circa 1933, and in 1938, with a group of investors, bought the company and became its president, managing the enterprise profitably for twenty years. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer
